data: The note "Brainstorming: AI Chatbot Features" focuses on proposed functionalities for an AI chatbot in the next product cycle.
The note "Brainstorming: AI Chatbot Features" contains possible chatbot features including natural language understanding, multi-language support, integration with CRM, and self-learning modules.
The note "Brainstorming: AI Chatbot Features" categorizes the brainstorming under product planning to guide development priorities.

The note "Brainstorming: AI Chatbot Features" identifies integration with CRM to align chatbot functionality with customer management systems.
The note "Brainstorming: AI Chatbot Features" proposes self-learning modules to enable continuous improvement of chatbot performance.
